com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino
Class Rainbowduino

java.lang.Object
  com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Rainbowduino
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

library to communicate with an arduino via serial port the arduino control up to n rainbowduinos usin the i2c protocol

Author:
Michael Vogt / neophob.com

Rainbowduino

sendRgbFrame

public void sendRgbFrame(byte addr,
                         int[] data)
wrapper class to send a rgb image to the rainbowduino. the rgb image gets converted to the rainbowduino compatible "image format"

Parameters:
data - rgb data
check - wheter to perform sensity check

sendFrame

public void sendFrame(byte addr,
                      byte[] data)
send a frame to the active rainbowduino the data needs to be in this format: buffer[3][8][4], The array to be sent formatted as [color][row][dots]

Parameters:
data - byte[3][8][4]
check - wheter to perform sensity check
